title: [Curlew Brook, Lower Slope]
description: Dappled sunlight filters through the branches of the ancient trees that dot this stretch of the riverbank, making the pure whites of scattered wildflowers growing amid the grassy lawns between the trees all the brighter.  The raked gravel path curves around a circular, granite open-air hearth, with a stack of split cordwood stored in a small wooden shelter close to hand.

Silvery starlight filters through the branches of the ancient trees that dot this stretch of the riverbank, making the pure whites of scattered wildflowers growing amid the grassy lawns between the trees all the brighter.  The raked gravel path curves around a circular, granite open-air hearth, with a stack of split cordwood stored in a small wooden shelter close to hand.
